Lakewood.Leader Building: The Leader Building is a 1913-completed 199 foot, 15 story, 322,600-square-foot high-rise located in downtown Cleveland, Ohio's Public Square district. It sits along the heavily travelled Superior Avenue. The building is named after the former Cleveland daily newspaper, "The Leader" which was founded by Edwin Cowles in 1854 and ran until it was sold to the Plain Dealer in 1917.
